Translations.Text: Ni raised mont them like ombrel ili opini gxi fal them Vi uphold ki ni don vi strongly memor kontent thereof ke vi sav
Recall ke your Lord summoned all descendants Adam hav them bor witness themselves Est mi ne your Lord Ili all dir Jes Ni bor witness Do vi ne dir Tag Resurrection Ni ne est aware da this
Nor can vi dir est our parents practiced idolatry ni simply sekv en their footsteps. Vi pun us ki others innovated
Ni tiel eksplik revelations enable popol redeem
Recite them news de 1 who don our proofs chose disregard them! Consequently diabl pursued him gxis li igx strayer

Hav ni willed ni elevated him therewith li insist baston muel pursued his own opinions! Tiel li est hund; vi pet him scold him li pantalon! Such est ekzempl popol reject our proofs Narrate these narrations ke ili reflect
mav ja est ekzempl popol reject our proofs est nur their own anim ili wrong
Whomever DI direkt des ver direkt unu whomever Li commits straying these est losers
Ni committed al Infer multitudes de jinns humans. Ili hav mens ili do ne kompren okul ili ne seg orel ili ne auxd! Ili est best; ne ili est far mav - Ili est totally unaware
Al DI aparten plej bel nom; vok Him therewith disregard those distort His nom! Ili requited their pek
Among our creations tie est those direkt truth truth renders them righteous
As por those reject our revelations ni plumb them sur them ever realizing gxi
Mi ecx encourage them; My scheming est formidable
Why ili ne reflect upon their amik (messenger)? Li ne est crazy Li est simply profound warner
Ili ne rigard dominion de heavens ter all ajx DI kre? Gxi Does ever occur them ke end their life est proksim? Which Hadith this ili kred en
Whomever DI commits straying tie ne est voj anyone direkt him! Li las them their pek blundering

Ili pet vi end de mond (Hor) kaj when gxi ven pas! Dir knowledge thereof est my Lord Nur Li reveals its temp. Heavy gxi est heavens ter. Gxi ne ven vi suddenly Ili pet vi vi est en control thereof! Dir knowledge thereof est DI plej popol ne kon
dir mi ne hav potenc benefit harm Nur ki DI vol okaz me Mi kon future mi increased my wealth ne harm aflikt me Mi est ne plur than warner bearer bon news those kred
